name: shortnr
description: A simple service to shorten URLs.

scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm run start"
scripts.seed: concurrently "cd backend && npm run seed && npm start" "cd frontend && npm run start"
scripts.reset: concurrently "cd backend && npm run reset && npm start" "cd frontend && npm run start"

author: Benyakir Horowitz
